summary:
In an effort to blog for no particular reason at all other than to explore my creative side more, I joined the community of bloggers for this month of Blaugust. 

"Blaugust is a blogging festival that takes place each year in August run by @belghast.  It focuses on building a community of bloggers and getting folks to get over their inhibitions and post create content more frequently...
title: Hello Blaugust!
